flawed_nl_solution:
The trucks cost 60 bottle caps because 10 x 6 = <<10*6=60>>60
He has 40 bottle caps left because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=40>>40
He spends 30 bottle caps on cars because 40 x 0.75 = <<40*0.75=30>>30
He gets 6 cars with this because 30 / 5 = <<30/5=6>>6
He gets 18 vehicles in total because 10 + 6 = <<10+6=18>>18
#### 18

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
